name: Encomienda
uniques: Removes extra unhappiness from annexed cities

name: Temple of Artemis
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Archery] units [in this city]
[+15]% Production when constructing [Ranged Gunpowder] units [in this city]
quote: 'It is not so much for its beauty that the forest makes a claim upon men's hearts, as for that subtle something, that quality of air, that emanation from old trees, that so wonderfully changes and renews a weary spirit.' - Robert Louis Stevenson

name: Al-Azhar University
uniques: [Great Engineer] is earned [+33]% faster <starting from the [Industrial era]>
May buy [Great Engineer] units for [500] [Faith] [in this city] at an increasing price ([100]) <before the [Industrial era]>
May buy [Great Engineer] units for [1000] [Faith] [in this city] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Industrial era]>
quote: 'We shape our buildings: thereafter they shape us.' -Winston Churchill

name: Stonehenge
uniques: [-25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
[-25]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
quote: 'Time crumbles things; everything grows old and is forgotten under the power of time' - Aristotle

name: Mausoleum of Halicarnassus
quote: 'The whole earth is the tomb of heroic men and their story is not given only on stone over their clay but abides everywhere without visible symbol woven into the stuff of other men's lives.' - Pericles

name: Dome Of The Rock
uniques: Must have an owned [Desert] within [2] tiles
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from [Desert] tiles [in this city]

name: Althing
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Tundra] tiles [in this city]

name: Ellora Caves
quote: 'As a devotee desires to worship any form of a god with faith, I make their faith firm and steady in that particular form' - Bhagavad Gita, 7:21

name: Huey Teocalli
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Food] from [Lakes] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Culture, +2 Food] from [Pink and White Terraces] tiles [in all cities] <hidden from users>

name: Angkor Wat
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Jungle] tiles [in all cities]
quote: 'The temple is like no other building in the world. It has towers and decoration and all the refinements which the human genius can conceive of.' - Antonio da Magdalena

name: Forbidden Palace
uniques: [+50]% Happiness from luxury resources gifted by City-States
quote: 'Most of us can, as we choose, make of this world either a palace or a prison' - John Lubbock

name: Himeji Castle
uniques: May buy [Military] units with [Faith] [in this city]
[+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
quote: 'Bushido is realized in the presence of death. This means choosing death whenever there is a choice between life and death. There is no other reasoning.' - Yamamoto Tsunetomo

name: Porcelain Tower
uniques: [+2 Science, +2 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'Things always seem fairer when we look back at them, and it is out of that inaccessible tower' - James Russell Lowell

name: Big Ben
uniques: [Gold] cost of purchasing items in cities [-15]%
quote: 'To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan, and not quite enough time.' - Leonard Bernstein

name: Brandenburg Gate
uniques: New [Military] units start with [20] XP [in all cities]
quote: 'Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings.' - Horace

name: Eiffel Tower
uniques: Gain a free [Broadcast Tower] [in this city]
quote: 'We live only to discover beauty, all else is a form of waiting' - Kahlil Gibran

name: Statue of Liberty
uniques: [+1 Production] from every specialist [in all cities]
quote: 'Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free, the wretched refuse of your teeming shore. Send these, the homeless, tempest-tossed to me, I lift my lamp beside the golden door!' - Emma Lazarus

name: Prora
quote: 'This loss (of freedom) means the fading from human life of values infinitely precious to it. There only remain ironbound conditions of employment and trivial amusements for leisure.' - A.N. Whitehead

name: Kremlin
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Armored] units [in all cities]
quote: 'The Law is a fortress on a hill that armies cannot take or floods wash away.' - The Prophet Muhammed

name: Neuschwanstein
uniques: Must have an owned [{non-[Natural Wonder]} {Mountain}] within [2] tiles
quote: '...the location is one of the most beautiful to be found, holy and unapproachable, a worthy temple for the divine friend who has brought salvation and true blessing to the world.' - King Ludwig II of Bavaria

name: Basílica de la Sagrada Família
uniques: [+4 Culture, +2 Happiness] [in this city] <starting from the [Atomic era]>
[+5 Culture, +3 Happiness] [in this city] <starting from the [Information era]>
[+6 Culture, +4 Happiness] [in this city] <while researching [Future Tech]>
quote: 'What must always be conserved is the spirit of the work, but its life has to depend on the generations it is handed down to and with whom it lives and is incarnated' - Antoni Gaudí

name: Pentagon
uniques: Gain [1500] [Gold] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>
quote: 'In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.' - Dwight D. Eisenhower

name: CN Tower
uniques: Gain a free [Broadcast Tower] [in all cities]
quote: 'Nothing travels faster than light with the possible exception of bad news, which obeys its own special rules.' - Douglas Adams

name: Monastery
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Wine] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Incense] tiles [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
